entry.title: WordPress
entry.summary:
You'll want to follow a few steps before replacing Gutenberg . Get the Classic Editor . This plugin helps restore WordPress back to what you wanted Get the Web component plugin
Get the HAX plugin
En

entry.title: Creating new ones
entry.summary: HAXeditor keeps so much functionality on the front-end that there's really very little tying it to..well.. anything. As a result, HAX is easy to integrate into systems that currently have WYSIWYG cap
entry.content: HAXeditor keeps so much functionality on the front-end that there's really very little tying it to..well.. anything. As a result, HAX is easy to integrate into systems that currently have WYSIWYG cap

entry.title: HAXcms
entry.summary: HAXcms, that which powers the site you are currently reading is a powerful "static site generator" paradigm. It leverages server technology in order to orchestrate a static site. That way the "server"
entry.content: HAXcms, that which powers the site you are currently reading is a powerful "static site generator" paradigm. It leverages server technology in order to orchestrate a static site. That way the "server"

entry.title: Concepts
entry.summary: HAXcms seeks to be a microsite generator and manager that doesn't require any command line in order to operate. HAXcms leverages HAX to give a best in class authoring experience while HAXcms seeks to
entry.content: HAXcms seeks to be a microsite generator and manager that doesn't require any command line in order to operate. HAXcms leverages HAX to give a best in class authoring experience while HAXcms seeks to

entry.title: Installation
entry.summary: Have PHP? well then you can setup HAXcms pretty quick. # HAX the web and answer the promptsbash scripts/haxtheweb.shAnswer the questions and then you'll be setup. We still recommend using HAXcms
entry.content: Have PHP? well then you can setup HAXcms pretty quick. # HAX the web and answer the promptsbash scripts/haxtheweb.shAnswer the questions and then you'll be setup. We still recommend using HAXcms

entry.title: Structure
entry.summary: By design we've got a very simple structure. The goal of HAXcms isn't to lock you into anything and so we've simplified our file structure over other solutions.The key directories / files include:fi
entry.content: By design we've got a very simple structure. The goal of HAXcms isn't to lock you into anything and so we've simplified our file structure over other solutions.The key directories / files include:fi

entry.title: Publishing
entry.summary: HAXcms requires being published in order to be visible by users. Working locally or on Desktop or on a server is akin to you writing a document on your computer. It's not shared with anyone. Then, whe
entry.content: HAXcms requires being published in order to be visible by users. Working locally or on Desktop or on a server is akin to you writing a document on your computer. It's not shared with anyone. Then, whe

entry.title: Theme layer

entry.title: Example themes
entry.summary: Explore some of the themes built for HAXcms that you get out of the box. This is a great demonstration of the performance and power of both web components and HAXcms (the system powering this site!).
entry.content: Explore some of the themes built for HAXcms that you get out of the box. This is a great demonstration of the performance and power of both web components and HAXcms (the system powering this site!).

entry.title: Basic

entry.title: Slide player
entry.summary: Slide player is great for lectures and presentation style sites (or parts of sites). It lets you focus on the content and has almost no UI.
entry.content: Slide player is great for lectures and presentation style sites (or parts of sites). It lets you focus on the content and has almost no UI.
